project.description: This example processes data from an aircraft in flight. A Transpose window is used to interchange an eventâ€™s rows as columns, and rows as columns. The Transpose window has two modes: long and wide. This project processes aircraft data in wide mode.

window-source.name: SourceW
window-source.description: This is a Source window, where aircraft events from the input-wide.csv file enter the model. When data is passed into this window, the following date format must be used: %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S

window-transpose.name: TransposeW
window-transpose.description: This is a Transpose window, where the transposition of the aircraft events occurs. You can configure the attributes of the Transpose window to govern the rearrangement of data.
